intent_atoms.description: Provide a virtualized parse tree outline view that supports incremental expansion and search filtering for large parse trees in SwiftUI.
The ParseTreeOutlineViewModel must be @MainActor to ensure SwiftUI updates are performed on the main thread.
The view model should support incremental expansion state of parse tree nodes.
The view model implements search/filter constraints that allow only partial or full matching of?

functional_units.name: ParseTreeOutlineViewModel
functional_units.description: Virtualizes ParseTreeSnapshot hierarchies, manages incremental expansion state, applies search/filter constraints, and updates SwiftUI on the main actor

functional_units.name: ParseTreeExplorerView
functional_units.description: SwiftUI component that renders large parse trees using LazyVStack and provides UI for exploring parse nodes

functional_units.name: ParseTreeOutlineView
functional_units.description: SwiftUI outline view displaying parse tree structure with expandable rows and severity badges

functional_units.name: RowBadges
functional_units.description: UI elements indicating severity levels of parse nodes within the explorer

functional_units.name: SeverityToggle
functional_units.description: Control to filter parse nodes by severity in the SwiftUI explorer

functional_units.name: SearchAutoExpansion
functional_units.description: Feature that automatically expands tree nodes when search results are found

functional_units.name: ParseTreePreviewData
functional_units.description: Reusable preview data set for testing and demonstrating the outline view without a live parse pipeline

functional_units.name: UnitCoverageTests
functional_units.description: Test suite covering expansion, search auto‑expansion, and severity filtering behavior in ParseTreeOutlineViewModel
